Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Pigmentation Disorders/Cafe-au-Lait Spots
Record.Description: Light brown pigmented macules associated with NEUROFIBROMATOSIS and Albright's syndrome (see FIBROUS DYSPLASIA, POLYOSTOTIC).
